HomePageV3.heroSubtitle: Experience seamless renting with our modern platform. Find, manage, and settle into your perfect space effortlessly.
HomePageV3.featuredPropertiesSubtitle: The best of SARAGEA. See our most popular listings complete with virtual tours and detailed information.
HomePageV3.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We provide more than just a place to live. We offer a complete ecosystem for a modern, comfortable, and secure lifestyle.
HomePageV3.whyChooseUsFeature1Desc: Your data and payments are protected with top-tier security measures, ensuring your peace of mind.
HomePageV3.whyChooseUsFeature2Desc: Pay your rent effortlessly from anywhere with multiple online payment options, all integrated into your dashboard.
HomePageV3.whyChooseUsFeature3Desc: Our dedicated support and maintenance teams are always available to assist you with any issues.
HomePageV3.testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from people who have found their homes with us.
HomePageV3.testimonial1Quote: The process was incredibly smooth. I found and moved into my new apartment in less than a week. The management is very responsive!
HomePageV3.testimonial2Quote: Being able to pay my rent and report maintenance issues online has been a game-changer. It's so convenient.
HomePageV3.testimonial3Quote: A truly professional service. The properties are well-maintained, and the team is always helpful. Highly recommended.
HomePageV3.ctaTitle: Ready to Find Your New Home?
HomePageV3.ctaSubtitle: Join our community of happy tenants today. Your next chapter starts here.

ShopByLifestyle.sectionSubtitle: Find a home that perfectly matches your way of life. We've curated selections for every need and aspiration.
ShopByLifestyle.oceanfrontLivingSubtitle: Wake up to the sound of waves.
ShopByLifestyle.cityHubSubtitle: Live in the heart of the action.

Interactive3D.sectionSubtitle: Get a true feel for our flagship property. Interact with the 3D model below to explore its features.
Interactive3D.propertyDescription: A stunning architectural masterpiece offering unparalleled luxury and breathtaking ocean views. This is more than a home; it's a lifestyle statement.

InteractiveMap.sectionSubtitle: Discover all our properties across the city on one interactive map. Your next home is just a click away.

AboutPage.heroSubtitle: Modern Living, Managed with Heart. Discover a new standard of comfort and convenience in the city.
AboutPage.storyParagraph1: Founded with a simple vision to provide high-quality, secure, and comfortable living spaces, SARAGEA Appartments has grown into a trusted name in residential management. We believe a home is more than just four walls; it's a foundation for your life.
AboutPage.storyParagraph2: As we grew, we saw the need to blend our traditional values of excellent service with the power of modern technology. This led to the creation of this digital platform, designed to make your rental experience seamless and stress-free.
AboutPage.digitalTitle: How It Works: Your Digital Renting Journey
AboutPage.digitalSubtitle: We've automated the entire process, putting you in control.
AboutPage.step1Desc: Browse our properties with high-quality photos, 3D tours, and detailed information. Filter by location, price, and amenities to find your perfect match.
AboutPage.step2Desc: Found a room you love? Reserve it instantly online and upload your documents securely through your personal dashboard.
AboutPage.step3Desc: Receive monthly invoices automatically. Pay your rent securely online via Mobile Money or Bank Transfer with just a few clicks. No more queues, no more hassle.
AboutPage.step4Desc: Report maintenance issues through your dashboard, track their status in real-time, and communicate directly with our management team.
AboutPage.value1Desc: Your safety is our top priority, with 24/7 security and modern safety features.
AboutPage.value2Desc: We provide well-maintained spaces with essential amenities for a comfortable lifestyle.
AboutPage.value3Desc: From digital leases to online payment history, every interaction is clear and straightforward.

ContactPage.heroSubtitle: We're here to help. Whether you have a question about our properties or need support, we're ready to assist.
ContactPage.address: 123 Masaki Road, Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
ContactPage.formSubtitle: Have a specific question? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactPage.bottomCtaTitle: Ready to Find Your Dream Property?
ContactPage.bottomCtaSubtitle: Get in touch with us today and let our experts guide you through every step of the process.
ContactPage.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
ContactPage.formSuccessToastDesc: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
ContactPage.formErrorToastDesc: Could not send your message. Please try again.
ContactPage.formResponseNotice: We typically respond to all inquiries within 1 business day. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

Onboarding.doneSubtitle: Enjoy browsing our properties. We're excited to have you with us.
